sentence: Also grabbing plenty of attention is a proposed resolution that would endorse removing from the House Republican Conference Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois two vocal Donald Trump critics who voted to impeach the then-president and the only two Republicans sitting on a Democratic- dominated House select committee investigating the deadly Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: 2024 debates, convention city, primary calendar on RNC winter meeting agenda

sentence: From the archives (November 2021): Wyoming Republicans vote that Liz Cheney is no longer a member of their party That, said Michael Steele, former lieutenant governor of Maryland who served as Republican National Committee chairman from 2009 to 2011, was beyond despicable.? Steele, speaking on MSNBC at midday Monday, said the censure showed depravity? and capitulation to the whims of Trump.
author: Associated Press
title: A defining moment': Kinzinger says Republican National Committee censure of him and Cheney shows McCarthy's weakness as House leader

sentence: Feb. 4 (UPI) -- The Republican National Committee on Friday approved a resolution censuring Reps. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., and Adam Kinzinger, R-Ill., for their participation on the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Danielle Haynes
title: RNC censures Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger for Jan. 6 committee participation

sentence: "The Republican National Committee hereby formally censures Representatives Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois and shall immediately cease any and all support of them as members of the Republican Party for their behavior, which has been destructive to the institution of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Republican Party and our republic, and is inconsistent with the position of the conference," read the resolution, which was obtained by NBC News.
title: At RNC gathering, rift emerges between Trump's interests and the party's

sentence: | Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images By David Siders and Natalie Allison 02/03/2022 08:04 PM EST SALT LAKE CITY Members of the Republican National Committee are pushing forward with a resolution to censure Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, while stopping short of calling for their expulsion from the House Republican Conference.
title: GOP set to rebuke Cheney, Kinzinger

sentence: A star chamber rendering judgment on Reps. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
title: Opinion: The RNC turns into an Orwellian horror show

sentence: GOP officials took a voice vote to approve censuring Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger at the party's winter meeting in Salt Lake City.
author: SAM METZ Associated Press
title: GOP censures Cheney, Kinzinger as it assails Jan. 6 probe

sentence: GOP officials took a voice vote to approve censuring Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois at the party's winter meeting in Salt Lake City.
author: SAM METZ Associated Press
title: GOP censures Cheney, Kinzinger as it assails Jan. 6 probe

sentence: Yet as the Republican National Committee concluded its winter meeting here on Friday, it was censuring two of its own, Reps. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
title: Trump's circular firing squad' threatens GOP midterm gains
